page.title: 07Events
page.content: {Events There is an annual carnival in Netherton and Flockton. These events are organised by their respective committees. Both carnivals include a procession of floats, bands,and other items of interest,e.g.Traction engines,Fire engines,Army exhibits etc. There are also field events which take place in the school playing fields at both schools after the procession. Flockton hold a horticultural show each summer. Since 1982 an offshhot of Flockton carnival committee put on a pantomime at Christmas in the school. The Netherton Carnival Committee organise an annual bonfire around Nov.5th and they also provide a Christmas float which tours the village with Father Christmas near Christmas Eve each year.
